description:
Charming one bedroom apartment in Williamsburg. 
Lots of light, spacious, comfortable. 
Close to subway line(URL HIDDEN)Bars, restaurants, shopping, music venues and galleries.

Wifi

As often as needed.

There is a ton of activities, close to the water and Manhattan. 
Music, bowling, ceramics, shopping, dining, friendly vibe, great coffee!

name: Beautiful cozy Williamsburg apart
review: Naama was very responsive and quite helpful as I needed to quickly locate an Airbnb. Always available when I needed her. Thanks again!
